subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jeff Skinner, an N.H.L. rookie of the year finalist, scored twice as Canada routed France, 9-1, in Kosice, Slovakia, to advance to the second round of the world championships.
snippet: Jeff Skinner, an N.H.L. rookie of the year finalist, scored twice as Canada routed France, 9-1, in Kosice, Slovakia, to advance to the second round of the world championships.
